To initiate a payment using our manual payment gateway, please follow the instructions provided below. We offer two convenient methods for you to choose from:
Option 1: PayPal Payment

  1. Log in to your PayPal account or access the PayPal website.
  2. Choose the option to send money or make a payment.
  3. Enter the recipient’s email address: business@paypal.com
  4. Specify the payment amount in the currency you wish to use.
  5. Make sure to select “Business” as the account type.
  6. Review the payment details and confirm the transaction.
  7. Keep the payment confirmation or receipt as proof of the transaction.

Option 2: Bank Transfer

  1. Visit your local bank or access your online banking platform.
  2. Initiate a new fund transfer or payment.
  3. Enter the recipient’s bank account details:
  • Bank Name: Bank of America
  • IBAN (International Bank Account Number): 01234567890
  1. Specify the payment amount in the currency you intend to use.
  2. Double-check all details, including the recipient’s account information.
  3. Confirm and authorize the transfer.
  4. Retain the payment receipt or confirmation for future reference.

Please ensure that you keep a record of your payment as proof of the transaction. In case of any discrepancies or verification requirements, you may be asked to provide this documentation.Your payment will be manually verified by our team, and once confirmed, your order will be processed promptly. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to serving you!

To initiate a payment using our manual payment gateway, please follow the instructions provided below. We offer two convenient methods for you to choose from:
Option 1: PayPal Payment

  2. Choose the option to send money or make a payment.
  3. Enter the recipient’s email address: business@paypal.com
  4. Specify the payment amount in the currency you wish to use.
  5. Make sure to select “Business” as the account type.
  6. Review the payment details and confirm the transaction.
  7. Keep the payment confirmation or receipt as proof of the transaction.

Option 2: Bank Transfer

  1. Visit your local bank or access your online banking platform.
  2. Initiate a new fund transfer or payment.
  3. Enter the recipient’s bank account details:
  • Bank Name: Bank of America
  • IBAN (International Bank Account Number): 01234567890
  1. Specify the payment amount in the currency you intend to use.
  2. Double-check all details, including the recipient’s account information.
  3. Confirm and authorize the transfer.
  4. Retain the payment receipt or confirmation for future reference.

Please ensure that you keep a record of your payment as proof of the transaction. In case of any discrepancies or verification requirements, you may be asked to provide this documentation.Your payment will be manually verified by our team, and once confirmed, your order will be processed promptly. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to serving you!

route.middleware: web, auth, sms.verification.guard, verification.guard, user.google.two.factor, system.maintenance

statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'script' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'bullion_plus' and table_name = 'temporary_datas'
select count(*) as aggregate from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `alias` = 'add-money-paystack-ngn-automatic'
select count(*) as aggregate from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `alias` = 'add-money-paystack-ngn-automatic'
select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (12) order by `id` desc
select * from `user_wallets` where `user_id` = 1 and exists (select * from `currencies` where `user_wallets`.`currency_id` = `currencies`.`id` and `code` = 'USD') limit 1

mails.subject: Add Money Via PayStack NGN
mails.headers:
From: Bullion Plus <support@bullion-plus.com>
To: iheonu6@gmail.com
Subject: Add Money Via PayStack NGN
mails.body:
[Bullion](http://localhost)

# Hello Daniel Iheonu !

Your add money request successful via PayStack NGN ,details of add money:

request Amount: 20 USD

Exchange Rate:  1 USD = 770.86 NGN

Fees & Charges: 463.516 NGN

Will Get: 20 USD

Total Payable Amount: 15880.72 NGN

TRX_ID: ETmtU7EzvdOE81HA

Status: Success

Date And Time: 2025-07-13 04:34:21 PM

Thank you for using our application!

Regards,
Bullion

© 2025 Bullion. All rights reserved.
